title: MechanicalStage
description: The mechanical stage positioning device associated with this instrument. It is not very common but can be found in simple surveying microscopes.

subCategoriesOrder.ManufacturerSpec: This is the base from which many microscope components are extended. E.g Objective, Filter etc. Provides attributes for recording common properties of these components such as Manufacturer name, Model etc. All of which are optional
subCategoriesOrder.Focusing: This describes the objective lens and stage positioning device(s) available for this instrument. An instrument may have more than one of these devices of different type, such as mechanical stage, piezoelectric stage, objective turret and piezoelectric objective.
subCategoriesOrder.MechanicalStage: The mechanical stage positioning device associated with this instrument. It is not very common but can be found in simple surveying microscopes.

Resolution.description: The expected motion resolution of this device.

PositionLinearityError.description: The expected positioning error associated with this device. Typically expressed as % error.

Repetability.description: The expected precision with which this device is capable of returning to a previously visited position. Typically expressed in % error.

SettingTime.description: The expected time it takes for this device to stabilize at the target position.

Name.description: A user defined name for this component.

ID.description: A unique identifier for this component.

MovementAxes.description: The axes or axis along which this device is capable of moving.

XTravelRange.description: The range this device is capable of moving in along the X axis.

YTravelRange.description: The range this device is capable of moving in along the Y axis.

ZTravelRange.description: The range this device is capable of moving in along the Z axis.

MaxVelocity.description: The maximum velocity at which this device is capable of moving.

SerialNumber.description: The serial number of this component

LotNumber.description: The lot number of this component

SpecsFile.description: Provide the location of a PDF file with the specifications for the component as provided by the manufacturer.

Description.description: This is a simple multi-line comment or annotation describing this component.

Tier.description: The tier level of this component.
